modName: Yol Toor Shibe - Fire Breath Edit and Standalone Spell
summary: Last word. So Shibe. Much fiery. Wow.
descriptionHtml:
[i]Last word. So Shibe. Much fiery. Wow.[/i]

So what does this mod do?
First of all it changes the last word of the Fire Breath shout. So instead of releasing a blast of fire, your Thu'um calls upon a flaming Shiba Inu (based on the Doge meme) from the depths of Oblivion. This mod also sets the cooldown for all firebreath words to 20 seconds.

The summoned dog is rather overpowered (unarmed set to 50), I intended to create this mod for hardcore/high level players.


Required files:
Pets of Skyrim (Dogs version) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17424/?

Incompatibility:
Mods that alter the firebreath shout as well as it's effects. I recommend loading my plugin after shout overhauls.

Thanks to:
-MisterKristeval on dA for making me come up with this idea xD
-qasiermo for their Pets of Skyrim mod which my plugin was based on.
author: T3alrose and qasiermo
